Translations.Text: Nay! By the moon
by the night as it withdraws
and by the morning as it brightens
truly it is one of the greatest
as a warner to the human being
for those of you who wish to go forth or stay behind
Every soul is held in pledge for what it has earned
save the companions of the right
in Gardens, questioning one another
about the guilty
“What led you into Saqar?”
They say, “We were not among those who prayed
nor did we feed the indigent
and we engaged in vain discourse with those who do the same
and we denied the Day of Judgment
until certainty came upon us.”
Thus the intercession of the intercessors will avail them not
So what ails them that they turn away from the Reminder
as if they were frightened asses
fleeing from a lion
Rather, every man among them desires to be given pages unfolded
Nay! But they fear not the Hereafter
Yea! Truly it is a reminder
So let whosoever will, remember it
And they remember not, save as God wills. He is most worthy of reverence and most worthy of granting forgiveness
